reviews.name: ChengC2016
reviews.subject: Buttery soft too yummy
reviews.comment: Align leggings are the bessssstessssttttttt! buttery soft indeed. I do wanna wear them everywhere if i could. So comfy. Whether doing yoga, rowing, working out, running or just lounging watching netflix, youâ€™d want to wear this. Filed under: never taking this off.
